text: Four Hearts () is a 1941 Soviet comedy movie directed by Konstantin Yudin.Что не пропустить по ТВ на неделе с 18 по 24 декабряСердца четырех (1941) It stars Valentina Serova, Yevgeny Samoylov, and Lyudmila Tselikovskaya. == Actors == * Valentina Serova as Galina Sergeyevna Murashova * Yevgeny Samoylov as First Lieutenant Pyotr Nikitich Kolchin * Lyudmila Tselikovskaya as Alexandra Sergeyevna 'Shura' Murashova * Pavel Shpringfeld as Gleb Zavartsev * Lisa Dmitriyevskaya as Antonia Vasiliyevna Murasheva, mother * Irina Murzaeva as Tamara Spiridonovna, manicurist == References == ==Other websites== * Category:1941 comedy movies Category:Soviet comedy movies Category:Movies directed by Konstantin Yudin
title: Four Hearts (1941 movie)
